data.text: @Blanco919isback @Coachlanese13 @Jusrangers @CDCgov A mask isn’t “suffering”. You’re an idiot.

@McDanielle01 @Coachlanese13 @Jusrangers @CDCgov Spoken like a person who never lost a child. I have & your answer is bullshit. It’s been 20 years for me & it still feels like a piece of my heart is gone.
@leeleeCT I'm not here to educate curmudgeons. I gave you the mortality data if you can't find age stratified data that's because you never passed 8th grade math. If you need a bich go get a dog.
@Coachlanese13 @CDCgov And at least 90% of those deaths under 18, Covid was incidental to the death.

@Blanco919isback @GMarctweets @Coachlanese13 @CDCgov I responded.  There’s no crickets.  He didn’t even give the data he was talking about, the elderly populations.  He gave general population data.  Like I said, he can’t provide the data he is claiming to have.  Pathetic.

@GMarctweets @Coachlanese13 @CDCgov Sweetie, this doesn’t show the data you were talking about.  You are assuming the death rates for total pop of each state are the same as death rates for elderly of each state.  Assuming isn’t the same as data.  Produce the data on the elderly pops of NY and FL, like I asked
@covidmommyporn @Jusrangers @CDCgov Lol no worries I am glad people got angry because it should make us all see red.  For 2 years, there has been a blatant and relentless attack on kids.
@Coachlanese13 @Jusrangers @CDCgov Yeh. 100% agree. I really had no way of understanding that you were putting that original comment out as sarcasm. So, sorry if I sounded like a reactionary twat.

@DeeNY___45 @Coachlanese13 @Jusrangers @CDCgov I bet 307 families would say their kids lived their life to the fullest. It’s called risk assessment. There’s no one to blame, tragic things happen to all ages every single day. Covid didn’t increase that risk.
